verses.verse: You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H7794>ox<s%> or his <S%H7716>sheep<s%> go <S%H5080>astray,<s%> and <S%H5956>hide<s%> yourself from <S%H7725>them:<s%> you shall surely bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> to your <S%H251>brother.<s%>

If your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H7138>isn't<s%> near to <S%H3045>you,<s%> or if you don't know <S%H622>him,<s%> then you shall bring it home <S%H8432>to<s%> your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and it shall be with you until your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H7725>it,<s%> and you shall restore it to him.

<S%H3651>So<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H2543>donkey;<s%> and so you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> with his <S%H8071>garment;<s%> and so you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> with every lost <S%H9>thing<s%> of your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s, which he has <S%H6>lost,<s%> and you have <S%H4672>found:<s%> you <S%H3201>may<s%> not hide <S%H5956>yourself.<s%>

You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H2543>donkey<s%> or his <S%H7794>ox<s%> fallen <S%H5307>down<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H5956>hide<s%> yourself from <S%H6965>them:<s%> you shall surely help him to lift them up <S%H6965>again.<s%>

A <S%H802>woman<s%> shall not wear <S%H1397>men<s%>'s <S%H3627>clothing,<s%> neither shall a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H802>women<s%>'s <S%H8071>clothing;<s%> for whoever <S%H6213>does<s%> these <S%H428>things<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

If a <S%H6833>bird<s%>'s <S%H7064>nest<s%> <S%H7122>chance<s%> to be <S%H6440>before<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> in any <S%H6086>tree<s%> or on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> with young <S%H667>ones<s%> or <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> and the <S%H517>hen<s%> <S%H7257>sitting<s%> on the <S%H667>young,<s%> or on the <S%H1000>eggs,<s%> you shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H517>hen<s%> with the <S%H1121>young:<s%>

you shall <S%H7971>surely<s%> let the <S%H517>hen<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> but the <S%H1121>young<s%> you may <S%H3947>take<s%> to <S%H3190>yourself;<s%> that it may be well with <S%H748>you,<s%> and that you may prolong your <S%H3117>days.<s%>

When you <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> then you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4624>battlement<s%> for your <S%H1406>roof,<s%> that you <S%H7760>don't<s%> bring <S%H1818>blood<s%> on your <S%H1004>house,<s%> if any <S%H5307>man<s%> fall from <S%H5307>there.<s%>

You shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> with two kinds of <S%H2233>seed,<s%> lest the whole <S%H4395>fruit<s%> be <S%H6942>forfeited,<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> which you have <S%H2232>sown,<s%> and the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>
You shall not <S%H2790>plow<s%> with an <S%H7794>ox<s%> and a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
You shall not <S%H3847>wear<s%> a <S%H8162>mixed<s%> <S%H6785>stuff,<s%> wool and <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> yourselves <S%H1434>fringes<s%> on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>borders<s%> of your <S%H3682>cloak,<s%> with which you cover <S%H3680>yourself.<s%>
If any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and goes <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H8130>her,<s%> and hates her,

and <S%H7760>accuses<s%> her of <S%H5949>shameful<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> and brings <S%H3318>up<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> on <S%H559>her,<s%> and says, "I <S%H3947>took<s%> this <S%H802>woman,<s%> and when I <S%H7126>came<s%> near to <S%H4672>her,<s%> I didn't find in her the tokens of <S%H1331>virginity;<s%>"

then shall the <S%H1>father<s%> of the young <S%H5291>lady,<s%> and her <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> and bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the tokens of the young <S%H5291>lady<s%>'s <S%H1331>virginity<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate;<s%>

and the young <S%H5291>lady<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> "I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to this <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H802>wife,<s%> and he hates <S%H8130>her;<s%>

and <S%H7760>behold,<s%> he has accused her of <S%H5949>shameful<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4672><s%> 'I didn't find in your <S%H1323>daughter<s%> the tokens of <S%H1331>virginity;<s%>' and yet these are the tokens of my <S%H1323>daughter<s%>'s <S%H1331>virginity.<s%>" They shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> the <S%H8071>cloth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> and chastise <S%H3256>him;<s%>

and they shall <S%H6064>fine<s%> him one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H1>father<s%> of the young <S%H5291>lady,<s%> because he has brought <S%H3318>up<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> on a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and she shall be his <S%H802>wife;<s%> he <S%H3201>may<s%> not put her <S%H7971>away<s%> all his <S%H3117>days.<s%>
But if this <S%H1697>thing<s%> be <S%H571>true,<s%> that the tokens of <S%H1331>virginity<s%> were not <S%H4672>found<s%> in the young <S%H5291>lady;<s%>

then they shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the young <S%H5291>lady<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of her <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> her to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H5619>stones,<s%> because she has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> in her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house:<s%> so you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>you.<s%>

If a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7901>lying<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1166>married<s%> to a <S%H1167>husband,<s%> then they shall both of <S%H8147>them<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H7901>lay<s%> with the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and the <S%H802>woman:<s%> so you shall put <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

If there is a young <S%H5291>lady<s%> who is a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> pledged to be <S%H781>married<s%> to a <S%H376>husband,<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> her in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and lie with <S%H7901>her;<s%>

then you shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> them <S%H8147>both<s%> out to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of that <S%H5892>city,<s%> and you shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> them to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H68>stones;<s%> the <S%H5291>lady,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> she <S%H6817>didn't<s%> cry, being in the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and the <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> he has <S%H6031>humbled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife:<s%> so you shall put <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the midst of <S%H7130>you.<s%>

But if the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H5291>lady<s%> who is pledged to be <S%H781>married<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2388>force<s%> <S%H7901>her,<s%> and lie with <S%H376>her;<s%> then the man only who <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her shall <S%H4191>die:<s%>

but to the <S%H5291>lady<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1697>nothing;<s%> there is in the <S%H5291>lady<s%> no <S%H2399>sin<s%> worthy of <S%H4194>death:<s%> for as when a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6965>rises<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H7523>kills<s%> <S%H1697>him,<s%> even so is this matter;
for he <S%H4672>found<s%> her in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> the pledged to be <S%H781>married<s%> <S%H5291>lady<s%> <S%H6817>cried,<s%> and there was none to save <S%H3467>her.<s%>

If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H5291>lady<s%> who is a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> who is not pledged to be <S%H781>married,<s%> and lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on <S%H7901>her,<s%> and lie with <S%H4672>her,<s%> and they be found;

then the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H5291>lady<s%>'s <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and she shall be his <S%H802>wife,<s%> because he has <S%H6031>humbled<s%> <S%H3201>her;<s%> he may not put her <S%H7971>away<s%> all his <S%H3117>days.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> and shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H3671>skirt.<s%>
